channel.title: terraform on Pitch by Shun Kakinoki

item.title: Terraform Nocode SaaS
item.description: Terraform Nocode SaaS Mission Democratize Infrastructure as a Code Problem Terraform is very frustrating IaaC should be automated too Takes long time even for simple tasks Solution Visually customize infrastructure Utilize nocode for better agility/cost/productivity All synced with git repository for easier integration
item.content:encoded: Terraform Nocode SaaS Mission Democratize Infrastructure as a Code Problem Terraform is very frustrating IaaC should be automated too Takes long time even for simple tasks Solution Visually customize infrastructure Utilize nocode for better agility/cost/productivity All synced with git repository for easier integration
